job.title: Autonomy AI Machine Learning Software Engineer
job.description: <strong><u>Summary Description<br><br></u></strong>The Autonomy/AI ML Software Engineer is responsible for developing, integrating, and deploying autonomy and<br><br>artificial intelligence algorithms for mission systems and production and maintenance operations. Translates<br><br>requirements and develops code, determining appropriate software methods, training system to recognize<br><br>patterns to perform specific functions. Supports the technology development life cycle from requirements<br><br>generation through development, integration, scenario development and modeling, testing and debugging.<br><br>May support research and development on prototyping of autonomous systems in some organizations.<br><br>Key Responsibilities<br><ul><li> Develops, integrates, and implements algorithms to enable perception, motion/mission planning, controls,<br></li></ul>etc. functionality in LM products and platforms<br><ul><li> Translates requirements and applies requirements to development code, integrating autonomy, AI or<br></li></ul>machine learning algorithms to LM products and platforms<br><ul><li> Determines software methods to best acquire and execute knowledge</li><li> Implements algorithms into software to train systems to recognize patterns and perform specific functions</li><li> Responsible for various phases of developing and maintaining autonomy software from requirements<br></li></ul>generation, software design and development to integration, testing, troubleshooting and debugging, and<br><br>implementation<br><ul><li> Review test outcomes, conducts troubleshooting, and works to debug issues</li><li> Develops human-machine interface scenarios, breaking missions into tasks</li><li> Documents interface requirements and implements human-machine interfaces</li><li> Interfaces with other teams involved the development lifecycle for perception, mission and motion<br></li></ul>planning, simulation and modeling, testing, etc.
